tool_description: Validates compatibility between camera bodies and lenses, checking mount types, autofocus support, and image stabilization features.

camera_models.description: List of camera model names to check

lens_models.description: List of lens model names to validate

check_stabilization.description: Whether to check image stabilization compatibility

error_messages: Empty camera or lens list: Provide at least one camera model and one lens model.
Unrecognized camera model: Ensure camera models are spelled correctly and exist in database.
Unrecognized lens model: Ensure lens models are spelled correctly and exist in database.
usage: Input your camera and lens models to verify compatibility. Optionally enable autofocus and stabilization checks for detailed compatibility analysis.

compatible_pairs.description: Camera-lens combinations that are fully compatible
